participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is a lively and creative individual who enjoys expressing herself through her favorite color, orange. She is currently navigating the challenges of young adulthood, including her recent breakup.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. my favorite color is orange.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is a friendly and outgoing person who loves music, especially country. He enjoys his job at the convenience store and has a passion for cars.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. my favourite music is country music. i'm a convenience store manager.
